cause.description:
This cause is to support all the Maronites spiritually to get them unified and closer under the patronage of Patriarche Mar Nassralla boutrous Sfeir. This is not to raise funds but to move the message all over the world to support all the Maronites.
1. To get the Maronites closer to each other.
2. To establish a strong Maronite Community
3. To save the Syriac Maronite Heritage
cause.name: Les Maronites
